author: Reuters Editorial
title: Yorkshire Building Society Posts FY 2017 ‍Profit Before Tax Of £165.8M
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Yorkshire Building Society:
* 2017 ‍PROFIT BEFORE TAX OF £165.8M (2016: £151.5M) AND CORE OPERATING PROFIT OF £160.2M​
* 2017 ‍COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 RATIO OF 15.8%​ * ‍2017 GROSS LENDING OF £8.1BN (2016: £7.2BN)​ Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
